name: 08-create-object-mode-transform-stream
description: By default Node.js streams operate on String, Buffer, or Uint8Array objects. However, it is possible to work with Node.js streams in **object mode**. This allows us to work with other JavaScript values except null value. In object mode, the values returned from the stream are generic JavaScript objects.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
